dct_description_sm: This line data layer represents interstates for Indiana in 2000. The dataset was originally published by the Indiana Geological Survey on June 23, 2003.[INTERSTATES_TIGER_IGS_IN is an ESRI ArcGIS shapefile of interstate highways in Indiana. Personnel of the IGS processed the road information contained in ROADS_TIGER00_IN, as produced by the U.S. Department of Commerce, U.S. Census Bureau, to show only the interstate highways in Indiana.]

CREDIT

It is requested that the Indiana Geological Survey be cited in any products generated from this data set. The following source citation should be included: [INTERSTATES_TIGER_IGS_IN: Interstate Highways in Indiana, Derived from TIGER Files (U.S. Census Bureau, 1:100,000, Line Shapefile)].
